import Mathlib

open Set Metric

/-- R^k as Euclidean space. -/
def Rk (k : â„•) := EuclideanSpace â„ (Fin k)

/-- The set of condensation points of E: every neighborhood of x meets E in an uncountable set. -/
def condensation_points {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X] (E : Set X) : Set X :=
  fun x => âˆ€ r > 0, Â¬ (E âˆ© ball x r).Countable

theorem Rudin_exercise_2_27a (k : â„•) {E : Set (Rk k)} (hE : Â¬ E.Countable) :
  let P := condensation_points (E : Set (Rk k)) in
  IsClosed P âˆ§ âˆ€ x âˆˆ P, âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ y âˆˆ P, y â‰  x âˆ§ dist x y < Îµ := by sorry
